name: Underground - Alpha Demo
description:
Description

The game consists of 2 modes, Survival mode and campaign.

Survival mod --> Goal is to survive against the monsters.4 build available in game.Camp,tower and totem.This 4 build can be upgradable

Campaign --> Consists of dozens of parts.Each part is more difficult and complex than the previous one.

You can buy new weapons and armor with the money you earn from monsters or upgradeable your weapon and armor.You get skill point as the level gets higher.You can upgrade your skills with skill points.

Short Summary

I am 19 years old.I'm a software developer.

I started learning software when I was 15 years old.I did many projects in 4 years.

I did websites, mobile games, etc.

I have been doing the "Underground" computer game with the unity game engine for +1 year.

In the demo version 

Only 1 character playable(There are 3 characters in total).

Only survival mode can be played.

Only 1 survival map playable(There are 3 survival maps in total).

Co-op not playable.

Can only play 10 rounds(There are nearly 100 rounds in total).

Note

You may encounter many bugs in the game.let me know when you encounter an bug.

I will try to update the game every week.New weapons, armor, skills, monsters... will be added.

I need support to improve the game.If you want to support me, you can find my indiegogo page here --> Indiegogo
